title: Smurfs
body:
Get into ranked lobby.
-"Im a plat smurf mid main"-
Goes yasuo.

Gets caught, we lose.
I said he wasnt a smurf, and enemy team agreed on that.
---------------
(I have blanked out most of his name- Riot if you have a prob lemme know- Ill blank the rest if you want)

Yasei Doubutsu: GG
Yasei Doubutsu: Plat smurf yasuo op
Queek Headtäker: lol
Queek Headtäker: not really
Queek Headtäker: just bad mid
DRUG** (Yasuo): LOL
Yasei Doubutsu: Yep
DRUG** (Yasuo): Ill add ypou
DRUG** (Yasuo): right now
DRUG** (Yasuo): And tell
DRUG** (Yasuo): you to fuck yourself
DRUG** (Yasuo): in the ass
Yasei Doubutsu: Im gay
DRUG** (Yasuo): in those exact words
Yasei Doubutsu: would love too
DRUG** (Yasuo): if you want
Queek Headtäker: umadbro
Yasei Doubutsu: Yasuo got caught out
Yasei Doubutsu: GG doe
Queek Headtäker: gg bl
Yasei Doubutsu: Lol leaves
Queek Headtäker: lol
Yasei Doubutsu: Goona wait for a random add on
Queek Headtäker: haha
Yasei Doubutsu: See if its real

---------------------------------

I got no new friend invite. :(
Im gonna assume he wasn't a smurf and he was just a mad bad.

replies.body:
> "Im a plat smurf mid main"

Yeh, 99% sure it's not a smurf account for a plat player. Bronze I'd believe but not plat.
How to smurf on oce step 1: lose lane. Step 2. profit because your team carried you and then take all the credit. Easy peasy.

Yeah if someone says they are a smurf and can't provide proof in the starting lobby, they aren't a smurf.

Plus most actual smurfs (that aren't boosting people) will either give no fucks what lane they get, or will actually want to play in their less strong lanes (i know a few smurfs that fit into both category's.)

Yeah, I know of a few aswell.
Smurfs will easily just either fill a role or just not give a fuck.

He still hasn't added me either. So I guess no new plat friend :(

Smurfs...theres not really much difference if there is a smurf or not...smurfs cant carry. He said he is a plat smurf. The plat part is probably true and its probably true that its their second account so therefore: its an alternate account of someone that isn't considered a smurf...
Its like A: Play safe their Vayne is a plat smurf. Me: *goes leblanc support with a corki GG* Vayne: I hate bursty supports

He had a duo partner (Leesin)
and Yasuos Account was Silver 5.
Lee was also really bad, kept ulting them out of CC and over walls.
No synergy between the two.

It was just one of those games, the way they both played. 
Was pretty horrid.
even tho...his attitude reflects his smurfiness

Even still, he was bad.
I think riot should link Accounts, like my Main to any smurf accounts I may or may not have.
I have no idea how they can do this.

But that way if X accounts are just troll accounts all the accounts suffer a punishment.
